Title: The Letter
Actors: Elodie Saada, Thomas Mouty, Jérôme Monot, Ilda Mouty
Plot: Michel Gondry's examination of childhood love is replete with his trademark surreality. One evening at the turn of the century, Stephane discusses with his brother the end of the millennium, but also girls, particularly Aurelie, a classmate with whom he is secretly in love. The following day, Aurelie has a letter to give to him....
